title: Pottermore releases first artwork for 'Harry Potter and the Cursed Child'
text:
Pottermore releases first artwork for 'Harry Potter and the Cursed Child' 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
J.K. Rowling may still be working on the script for her upcoming West End play Harry Potter and the Cursed Child, but the first promotional ...
